adviseScripts.text: Welcome, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: What kind of tea would you like today?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Give me the usual, if you would.
I'd like a nice hot cup of iced milk tea.
Got it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Do you remember what I usually order?
Of course.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You like the Maid For You special blend,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: served nice and hot, but not piping hot to the point that it burns your tongue.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Is that correct?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Perfect.
Got it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Uh... you're actually going to make that?
Of course!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Don't you worry, I'll have that ready for you in just a minute.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You won't be disappointed.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I don't have the heart to tell Ade that I was just messing around.
Wait right here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I sip on the tea Ade made for me, and we have an enjoyable session.
What do you feel is the most important aspect of good service?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That you put your heart and soul into it.
Professionalism and skill.
I see...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I still think that I'm a bit lacking in that area.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'll try to remedy that going forward.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Oh, really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That's a relief, since that's more in my wheelhouse.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I guess I'll just keep at it!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That way, you'll keep getting the finest service that you can enjoy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: The important thing is that you're satisfied.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Ade about service.
Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Do you prefer sunny or rainy days?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You can't beat sunny days. What about you?
You can't beat rainy days. What about you?
If you ask me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I like them both,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: but customers who visit the cafe usually have brighter expressions on their faces when it's sunny out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: So I think I find sunny days more enjoyable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: If you ask me...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I like them both,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: but I always get bummed out when I see people all out of sorts
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: because they got caught in the rain and their clothes are drenched.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: So I think I find sunny days more enjoyable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Ade about the weather.
In a book I read recently,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: one of the characters asks, "What is happiness"?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That got me thinking:
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: When you feel the happiest, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: When I'm alone in my room, quietly resting.
When I'm spending time with you.
Sure, getting sufficient rest is important
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: to have a fulfilling day,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: but don't forget to visit the cafe once in a while.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Otherwise, I'll worry about you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Hehe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I feel the same way when I'm around you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I love spending time with you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Nothing makes me happier than seeing you happy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I spend an amiable session together.
The Commander's Room is so immaculate, it's practically sparkling.
I tidied up a bit before you arrived.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: What do you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I like it. Thanks.
It doesn't even feel like my room anymore.
Hehe, I'm glad you like it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You can always call on me whenever you need some cleaning done.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Oh no! I'm sorry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Did I go a little overboard?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: If you don't feel comfortable in here, I can change it back to the way it was.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: No, I just meant that it's very clean.
Oh, haha! So that's what you meant.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade gives me some pointers on how to properly clean a room.
I prepared dessert for you, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I hope you enjoy it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade presents me with a three-tiered dessert tray filled with colorful and appetizing treats.
Isn't it hard whipping up so many different desserts?
It looks delicious. Thank you.
Not at all. Nothing is hard when I'm doing it for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Did I look like I was unhappy somehow?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: If so, I apologize for giving off the wrong impression and making you worry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Wait one moment, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: *Clatter*
Ade deftly takes out the dish at the very bottom.
You can start from level 1.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Let me know when you're done or if you want to switch to one of the other plates.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Thanks to Ade, I enjoy a sumptuous afternoon tea.
The wheel on the trolly that I use is broken.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've sent it in for repairs, but it looks like I won't be able to use it today.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: What a pain...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Indeed.
You must be worried for your faithful trolley.
It'll be fine.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'll just have to work a little harder.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Sorry to bother you with my problems.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ha,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I didn't expect you to be so thoughtful, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That's quite considerate of you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Yes, in a way, that trolley is my most trusted partner,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: so I am rather concerned about how it's doing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: More than that though, without that trolley,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I can't bring you dessert and tea at the same time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: To be honest, that's what I find most upsetting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I have a conversation about how efficient trolleys can be.
This is something of a random question,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: but what kind of girls are you into?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Someone who is reliable and professional.
Someone cute and bubbly.
So you like people who share the same traits as yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've always considered you both reliable and professional.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You are as well, Ade.
Really?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, I'm glad you see me that way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Sounds like Soda is more your type.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Cute and bubbly would certainly be apt descriptors for her.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: It's too bad I'm not like that...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I have a conversation about our ideal partners.
One of our customers professed that he was a diehard fan, and asked for an autograph.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've never given an autograph before, though.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: How should I sign my name?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Write it down neatly, in block letters.
Write it down in flowing cursive.
That should be simple enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Just a moment.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: *Scribble scribble*
Like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Perfect.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've never tried writing like that before, but I'll give it a try.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: *Scribble scribble*
Like this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Er... maybe we can try another way.
I help Ade figure out a pleasing signature.
Watching Cocoa do her ketchup dance
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: always lifts my spirits, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Do you like it too, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm not a fan. She always splashes ketchup all over the place.
Of course, I love it.
Oh dear...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I suppose you're right, she does tend to make a mess.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I should have been faster cleaning it up.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: It's my fault, I apologize.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, I knew that's what you'd say, but I still wanted to ask.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've seen you grinning from ear to ear whenever you watch her dance.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Cocoa will be delighted to hear that's how you feel.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I have a conversation about Cocoa's ketchup dance.
Do you prefer food
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: that you have to dip in sauce,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: or ones with sauce drizzled on top?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I prefer dipping.
I prefer to have sauce drizzled on top.
That's perfect,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: because I prepared a fondue.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: If you want the full flavor experience, you should dip the baguette into the cheese before digging in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I hope you enjoy it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Oh...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Well, I prepared a fondue, but it might be difficult to eat it if you pour the cheese.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Sorry to disappoint you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: No need to apologize. I'm sure I'll enjoy it.
I finished the fondue that Ade had prepared.
Where does Soda get all her energy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it's because she's so happy.
Because she's a straightforward person.
Hehe, that's an interesting thought.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Maybe I'll ask Soda about it next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I wonder how she'll react.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Is that what you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I thought it was just because
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: she's such a positive person.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I find ourselves both thinking about Soda, which puts us in a good mood.
Master,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: when you've visited the Maid Cafe,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: has there ever been anything that made you feel uncomfortable?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: One time, Soda tripped and spilled a tray full of drinks on my lap.
Nope. It's perfect every time I visit.
Oh my goodness!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: That must have been a real hassle for you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Allow me to apologize on her behalf.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You're too kind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for always seeing us in a positive way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I hope you'll continue to visit us often!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: We'll be waiting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Ade about the service at the cafe.
I'm a perfectionist when it comes to providing flawless service.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Oftentimes, however, Cocoa and Soda seem to have a hard time with this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: There are moments when I worry that I may be demanding too much from them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: What do you think, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Having that attitude might make them feel a bit stressed.
I also won't accept anything less than perfect.
You think so?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I haven't been terribly considerate of their feelings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Thank you for the advice, Master. You've been very helpful.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad we're on the same page.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: It's nice to know that you're on my side, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You're such a kind person, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade heads back to the cafe with a satisfied expression.
It's rather peculiar...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Whenever I'm with you, I always feel at peace.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Why do you think that is?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Maybe it's because we're such good friends.
Maybe it's because you feel you can trust me completely.
I can tell you for certain that
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: that is not the case.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've never considered you to be just a friend.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Wow!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: It's like you're peering straight into my mind.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I've always trusted and relied on you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: There's no one else I would wish to serve more than you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I spend a peaceful moment with Ade.
I'm always so grateful to make your acquaintance, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I really would like to be able to show you my gratitude.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Is there perhaps something that you want in particular?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'd like to take you out.
I'd like a coupon for some free food at the Maid Cafe.
Would that be enough?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Very well, I'll try and arrange for some time off as soon as I can.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'll let you know as soon as I find out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: This is so exciting, hehe!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm looking forward to it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Oh, well... sorry, that's not really something I can decide on my own.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Soda, Cocoa and I all manage the Maid Cafe together,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: so I'll have to go back and discuss it with them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I continue our conversation, with me offering more ideas on things I want.
*Rustle*
I'm sorry, Master.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I didn't mean to wake you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I was trying to cover you with a blanket, but...
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Sorry, I must have dozed off.
I was in the middle of a wonderful dream...
Hehe, it's all right.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You're more than welcome to sleep here whenever you're tired.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Getting proper rest is important.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Why don't you head over to your bed, though?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'll go get you some fresh sheets.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I really am sorry for disrupting your sleep.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'll be more careful next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: You don't quite look well-rested yet. Why don't you sleep a little longer?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: We end our session prematurely, due to my fatigue.
I've just drizzled some ketchup on the omurice.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Would you like me to say the delicious spell?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Wait for Ade to enchant the spell.
Recite the spell yourself.
May this dish be delicious♪ May this dish be delicious♪
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Thump thump boing♡
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Hehe, I kind of thought that you would join in.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: May this dish be delicious♪ May this dish be delicious♪
Thump thump boing♡
Oh my goodness,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: you memorized the entire thing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Well, I'm sure your omurice will be extra delicious now, hehe.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Indeed, the omurice proved to be exceptionally delicious.
One of our regular customers said that
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: he wanted to see us in different uniforms.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: What do you think of that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I don't think anything can top your maid uniforms.
Actually, I'm curious to see what you'd look like in casual clothes.
I feel the same way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: A maid uniform goes hand in hand with providing the best service.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: It's the look that I personally prefer.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm glad you understand that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: So you're curious as well?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: All right, I'll try on something different next time.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm a bit worried though, because I'm not used to wearing something casual.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Ade about outfits.
What do you usually do on your days off, Master?
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I usually hang out in my room and relax.
I go out and about.
It's nice to have a relaxing day in,
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: but I hope that you'll find it in you to visit our cafe sometimes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Things always seem a bit dreary here without you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Then you can drop by the cafe
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: on your next day off!
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I guarantee that we'll provide you with the best service you've ever experienced.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: I'm looking forward to seeing you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Ade

adviseScripts.text: Ade and I have a conversation about the importance of rest.
